CmdLine: echo "Install pip3" && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get -y install python3-pip
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: echo "Install conan" && pip3 install conan && conan remote add bincrafters https://api.bintray.com/conan/bincrafters/public-conan
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: echo "Install cmake" && cd $HOME && wget https://cmake.org/files/v3.11/cmake-3.11.2-Linux-x86_64.tar.gz && tar -xzf cmake-3.11.2-Linux-x86_64.tar.gz && cp cmake-3.11.2-Linux-x86_64/bin/cmake /usr/local/bin && cp -a cmake-3.11.2-Linux-x86_64/share/. /usr/local/share/
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: echo "Install ninja" && apt-get update && apt-get install -y ninja-build
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: echo "Install ccache" && apt-get update && apt-get install -y ccache
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: echo "Install protobuf" && curl -OL https://github.com/google/protobuf/releases/download/v3.6.0/protoc-3.6.0-linux-x86_64.zip && unzip protoc-3.6.0-linux-x86_64.zip -d protoc3 && sudo mv protoc3/bin/* /usr/local/bin/ && sudo mv protoc3/include/* /usr/local/include/
Commands.Name: run
